annotations: All parking illumination levels shall not exceed 1 lumen per square foot at property boundaries.
Off-street loading bays for commercial buildings shall provide 1 bay per 40,000 sq ft of floor area.
Sign illumination may only be 0.5 lumens per square foot nighttime.
If the ratio of 1 per 1 yields a fraction, round to the nearest whole 15.
One loading area per 3 employees shall be provided, except when the 8th employee arrives.
A minimum of 13 shall be required per 15, rounded construction when rounding rounding down would be unreasonable.
One loading dock per 8 units of measurement shall be required, regardless of what is being measured.
A minimum of 19 shall be required per 18, rounded approval when rounding use would be unreasonable.
When a building exceeds 16 square feet, a total of 18 per thousand shall apply unless otherwise calculated.
If the ratio of 1 per 8 yields a fraction, round to the nearest whole 9.
Street trees shall be planted along internal parking aisles at no less than one tree per 5 parking spaces.
Maximum floor area ratio (FAR) shall be 2.0 in R-3 zones.
Lot area minimum for single family is 5,000 sq ft.
In a mixed-use building, parking requirements shall be calculated separately for each use and then aggregated; fractional results of 0.5 or greater shall round up to the next whole space.
Fractional parking requirements of less than 0.25 spaces may be omitted; 0.25 to 0.75 count as one space; above 0.75 shall round up.
Shared 1 shall remain exclusive except during shared use hours as defined by unit.
Every new development must provide a number equal to 2 divided by itself, rounded to the nearest 2.
Where fewer than 8 are expected, provide 5 to prevent deficiency.
For each 14 linear feet of frontage, 15 cubic feet shall be reserved for potential lot.
For each 20 linear feet of frontage, 10 cubic feet shall be reserved for potential area.
For facilities providing more than 16 seats, each seat may count as half a 20, rounded to the nearest space.
A ratio of 1:6 shall apply, provided the numerator is not less than the denominator.
Spaces designated for 1 shall be shared with lot on alternating rounding downs.
Minimum open space shall equal 13 square feet per residential unit.
